page.title: 13HARMBY AREA - TOURISM
page.content: THERE ARE THREE CARAVAN PARKS IN OUR AREA:OVER DALE,LOWER WENSLEYDALE AND NORTH YORKSHIRE DALES.THIS IS A VERY POPULAR TOURIST AREA BECAUSE OF THE COUNTRYSIDE,FRESH AIR AND VERY BEAUTIFUL VIEWS.THE RECENT TELEVISION SERIES"ALL CREATURES GREAT AND SMALL" WAS FILMED IN THIS AREA AND THIS ATTRACTS MANY TOURISTS FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD.A LOT OF TOURISTS COME ON WALKING HOLIDAYS AND TO STUDY THE WILDLIFE OF THE OPEN.THERE ARE LANES AND FOOTPATHS LEADING TO MANY PLEASANT PLACES THAT ARE POPULAR WITH VISITORS. THERE ARE NO SHOPS IN THIS AREA APART FROM THOSE ON THE CARAVAN SITES FOR THE TOURISTS.TRADITIONAL COUNTRY CRAFTS ARE STILL FOLLOWED LIKE BAKING, GARDENING AND JAM-MAKING.EVERY YEAR THE W.I ORGANISE A SHOW IN THE HARMBY VILLAGE HALL WHERE PEOPLE BRING THEIR HOMEMADE PRODUCTS.
